body.p:
Elkton Ky Sept 25 1865
Hon Thomas E Bramlett
Frankfort
Dear Sir

I am aquainted with Mrs Elizabeth Gibson who was fined one hundred dollars at the April Term of the Todd Circuit Court,, She is quite old and infirm and has to labor in the field for a support,, and your friend B L Perkins wished me to make the above Statement to you, She is deserving of your Excellency Clemency and if you cannot remit her fine please give her a respite,, & time to make the formoney to pay said fine I was not present at the trial and know nothin of the testimony in the case

P S
If you remit said fine you will please Send it to my Care as she lives some ten miles in Country
